messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/23/2003 10:18:25 PM Eastern Standard Time, leschke@shaw.ca writes: First thing that crossed my mind was darn .  Then I felt guilty for
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/23/2003 10:18:25 PM Eastern Standard Time,
leschke@... writes:
First thing that crossed my mind was "darn". Then I felt guilty for
>thinking it.....but oh....no 18 trips to the gym each week.....no weekends
>sitting in bleachers for hours....<sigh>

LOL! Try standing out in the rain for a couple of hours watching soccer.
Tia


Try 19 innings of baseball in the pouring rain, in March, in Virginia...it
was horrid but I wouldn't have missed it for the world.

glena
